title: Fixing RHEA xref. Fixes #30179
author: sjm41

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body:
<!-- GITHUB_ACTION_COMMENT_PR -->
Here's a diff of how these changes impact the classified ontology: 

# Ontology comparison

## Left
- Ontology IRI: `http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/go.owl`
- Version IRI: `http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/go/releases/2025-06-06/go.owl`
- Loaded from: `file:/__w/go-ontology/go-ontology/src/ontology/../../reasoned-master.owl/reasoned.owl`

## Right
- Ontology IRI: `http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/go.owl`
- Version IRI: `http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/go/releases/2025-06-06/go.owl`
- Loaded from: `file:/__w/go-ontology/go-ontology/src/ontology/../../reasoned-pr.owl/reasoned.owl`

### Ontology imports 



### Ontology annotations 



### 2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity `http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626`
#### Removed
- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [has_exact_synonym](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasExactSynonym) "2-halobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [database_cross_reference](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref) "MetaCyc:2-CHLOROBENZOATE-12-DIOXYGENASE-RXN" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [database_cross_reference](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref) "RHEA:21652" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [label](http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label) "2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [database_cross_reference](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref) "UM-BBD_reactionID:r0632" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [definition](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000115) "Catalysis of the reaction: 2-chlorobenzoate + NADH + H+ + O2 = catechol + chloride + NAD+ + CO2." 
  - [database_cross_reference](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref) "EC:1.14.12.13" 

#### Added
- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [database_cross_reference](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref) "MetaCyc:RXN-13706" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [definition](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000115) "Catalysis of the reaction: a 2-halobenzoate + NADH + O2 + H+ = a halide anion + catechol + CO2 + NAD+." 
  - [database_cross_reference](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref) "RHEA:53736" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [label](http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label) "2-halobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [database_cross_reference](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref) "RHEA:53736" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [has_narrow_synonym](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasNarrowSynonym) "2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity" 

- [2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/GO_0018626) [term tracker item](http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000233) "https://github.com/geneontology/go-ontology/issues/30179"^^[anyURI](http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI)

 id: GO:0018627

comments.author: sjm41
comments.body:
id: GO:0018626
name: 2-chlorobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity
namespace: molecular_function
def: "Catalysis of the reaction: 2-chlorobenzoate + NADH + H+ + O2 = catechol + chloride + NAD+ + CO2." [EC:1.14.12.13]
synonym: "2-chlorobenzoate,NADH:oxygen oxidoreductase (1,2-hydroxylating, dechlorinating, decarboxylating)" RELATED [EC:1.14.12.13]
synonym: "2-halobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity" EXACT []
xref: EC:1.14.12.13
xref: MetaCyc:2-CHLOROBENZOATE-12-DIOXYGENASE-RXN
xref: RHEA:21652
xref: UM-BBD_reactionID:r0632
is_a: GO:0016708 ! oxidoreductase activity, acting on paired donors, with incorporation or reduction of molecular oxygen, NAD(P)H as one donor, and incorporation of two atoms of oxygen into one donor


EC:1.14.12.13
a 2-halobenzoate + NADH + O2 + H(+) = a halide anion + catechol + CO2 + NAD(+)

RHEA:53736
a 2-halobenzoate + NADH + O2 + H+ = a halide anion + catechol + CO2 + NAD+

RHEA:21652 (specific form of RHEA:53736)
2-chlorobenzoate + NADH + O2 + H+ = catechol + chloride + CO2 + NAD+

---

- [x] Change RHEA xref to RHEA:53736 and update def to match
- [x] Change label to 2-halobenzoate 1,2-dioxygenase activity (which would match current EC)
- [x] Change MetaCyc xref to RXN-13706
